query: SELECT t.d1 AS t, i.f1 AS i, t.d1 + i.f1 AS "add", t.d1 - i.f1 AS "subtract" FROM TIMESTAMP_TBL t, INTERVAL_TBL i WHERE t.d1 BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2001-01-01' AND i.f1 BETWEEN '00:00' AND '23:00' ORDER BY 1,2
expected: SELECT t.d1 AS t, i.f1 AS i, t.d1 + i.f1 AS "add", t.d1 - i.f1 AS subtract FROM timestamp_tbl AS t, interval_tbl AS i WHERE t.d1 BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2001-01-01' AND i.f1 BETWEEN '00:00' AND '23:00' ORDER BY 1, 2

query: SELECT t.f1 AS t, i.f1 AS i, t.f1 + i.f1 AS "add", t.f1 - i.f1 AS "subtract" FROM TIME_TBL t, INTERVAL_TBL i WHERE isfinite(i.f1) ORDER BY 1,2
expected: SELECT t.f1 AS t, i.f1 AS i, t.f1 + i.f1 AS "add", t.f1 - i.f1 AS subtract FROM time_tbl AS t, interval_tbl AS i WHERE isfinite(i.f1) ORDER BY 1, 2

query: SELECT t.f1 AS t, i.f1 AS i, t.f1 + i.f1 AS "add", t.f1 - i.f1 AS "subtract" FROM TIMETZ_TBL t, INTERVAL_TBL i WHERE isfinite(i.f1) ORDER BY 1,2
expected: SELECT t.f1 AS t, i.f1 AS i, t.f1 + i.f1 AS "add", t.f1 - i.f1 AS subtract FROM timetz_tbl AS t, interval_tbl AS i WHERE isfinite(i.f1) ORDER BY 1, 2

query: SELECT (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27', timestamp with time zone '2000-11-28') OVERLAPS (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', timestamp with time zone '2000-11-30') AS "True"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('2000-11-28' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('2000-11-30' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)) AS "True"

query: SELECT (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-26', timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27') OVERLAPS (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', timestamp with time zone '2000-11-30') AS "False"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-26' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('2000-11-30' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)) AS "False"

query: SELECT (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27', timestamp with time zone '2000-11-28') OVERLAPS (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', interval '1 day') AS "True"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('2000-11-28' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('1 day' AS INTERVAL)) AS "True"

query: SELECT (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27', interval '12 hours') OVERLAPS (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', timestamp with time zone '2000-11-30') AS "False"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('2000-11-30' AS TIMESTAMPTZ)) AS "False"

query: SELECT (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27', interval '12 hours') OVERLAPS (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27', interval '12 hours') AS "True"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL), CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL)) AS "True"

query: SELECT (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27', interval '12 hours') OVERLAPS (timestamp with time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', interval '12 hours') AS "False"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMPTZ), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL)) AS "False"

query: SELECT (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27', timestamp without time zone '2000-11-28') OVERLAPS (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', timestamp without time zone '2000-11-30') AS "True"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('2000-11-28' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('2000-11-30' AS TIMESTAMP)) AS "True"

query: SELECT (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-26', timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27') OVERLAPS (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', timestamp without time zone '2000-11-30') AS "False"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-26' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('2000-11-30' AS TIMESTAMP)) AS "False"

query: SELECT (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27', timestamp without time zone '2000-11-28') OVERLAPS (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', interval '1 day') AS "True"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('2000-11-28' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('1 day' AS INTERVAL)) AS "True"

query: SELECT (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27', interval '12 hours') OVERLAPS (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', timestamp without time zone '2000-11-30') AS "False"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('2000-11-30' AS TIMESTAMP)) AS "False"

query: SELECT (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27', interval '12 hours') OVERLAPS (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27', interval '12 hours') AS "True"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL), CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL)) AS "True"

query: SELECT (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27', interval '12 hours') OVERLAPS (timestamp without time zone '2000-11-27 12:00', interval '12 hours') AS "False"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('2000-11-27' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL), CAST('2000-11-27 12:00' AS TIMESTAMP), CAST('12 hours' AS INTERVAL)) AS "False"
SELECT overlaps(CAST('00:00' AS TIME), CAST('01:00' AS TIME), CAST('00:30' AS TIME), CAST('01:30' AS TIME)) AS "True"

query: SELECT (time '00:00', interval '1 hour') OVERLAPS (time '00:30', interval '1 hour') AS "True"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('00:00' AS TIME), CAST('1 hour' AS INTERVAL), CAST('00:30' AS TIME), CAST('1 hour' AS INTERVAL)) AS "True"

query: SELECT (time '00:00', interval '1 hour') OVERLAPS (time '01:30', interval '1 hour') AS "False"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('00:00' AS TIME), CAST('1 hour' AS INTERVAL), CAST('01:30' AS TIME), CAST('1 hour' AS INTERVAL)) AS "False"

query: SELECT (time '00:00', interval '1 hour') OVERLAPS (time '01:30', interval '1 day') AS "False"
expected: SELECT overlaps(CAST('00:00' AS TIME), CAST('1 hour' AS INTERVAL), CAST('01:30' AS TIME), CAST('1 day' AS INTERVAL)) AS "False"

query: CREATE TABLE TEMP_TIMESTAMP (f1 timestamp with time zone)
expected: CREATE TABLE temp_timestamp (f1 TIMESTAMPTZ)

query: INSERT INTO TEMP_TIMESTAMP (f1) SELECT d1 FROM TIMESTAMP_TBL WHERE d1 BETWEEN '13-jun-1957' AND '1-jan-1997' OR d1 BETWEEN '1-jan-1999' AND '1-jan-2010'
expected: INSERT INTO temp_timestamp (f1) (SELECT d1 FROM timestamp_tbl WHERE d1 BETWEEN '13-jun-1957' AND '1-jan-1997' OR d1 BETWEEN '1-jan-1999' AND '1-jan-2010')

query: SELECT f1 AS "timestamp" FROM TEMP_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY "timestamp"
expected: SELECT f1 AS timestamp FROM temp_timestamp ORDER BY timestamp

query: SELECT d.f1 AS "timestamp", t.f1 AS "interval", d.f1 + t.f1 AS plus FROM TEMP_TIMESTAMP d, INTERVAL_TBL t ORDER BY plus, "timestamp", "interval"
expected: SELECT d.f1 AS timestamp, t.f1 AS interval, d.f1 + t.f1 AS plus FROM temp_timestamp AS d, interval_tbl AS t ORDER BY plus, timestamp, interval

query: SELECT d.f1 AS "timestamp", t.f1 AS "interval", d.f1 - t.f1 AS minus FROM TEMP_TIMESTAMP d, INTERVAL_TBL t ORDER BY minus, "timestamp", "interval"
expected: SELECT d.f1 AS timestamp, t.f1 AS interval, d.f1 - t.f1 AS minus FROM temp_timestamp AS d, interval_tbl AS t ORDER BY minus, timestamp, interval

query: SELECT d.f1 AS "timestamp", timestamp with time zone '1980-01-06 00:00 GMT' AS gpstime_zero, d.f1 - timestamp with time zone '1980-01-06 00:00 GMT' AS difference FROM TEMP_TIMESTAMP d ORDER BY difference
expected: SELECT d.f1 AS timestamp, CAST('1980-01-06 00:00 GMT' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) AS gpstime_zero, d.f1 - CAST('1980-01-06 00:00 GMT' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) AS difference FROM temp_timestamp AS d ORDER BY difference

query: SELECT d1.f1 AS timestamp1, d2.f1 AS timestamp2, d1.f1 - d2.f1 AS difference FROM TEMP_TIMESTAMP d1, TEMP_TIMESTAMP d2 ORDER BY timestamp1, timestamp2, difference
expected: SELECT d1.f1 AS timestamp1, d2.f1 AS timestamp2, d1.f1 - d2.f1 AS difference FROM temp_timestamp AS d1, temp_timestamp AS d2 ORDER BY timestamp1, timestamp2, difference

query: SELECT f1 AS "timestamp", date(f1) AS date FROM TEMP_TIMESTAMP WHERE f1 <> timestamp 'now' ORDER BY date, "timestamp"
expected: SELECT f1 AS timestamp, date(f1) AS date FROM temp_timestamp WHERE f1 <> CAST('now' AS TIMESTAMP) ORDER BY date, timestamp
DROP TABLE temp_timestamp
SELECT CAST(CAST('2202020-10-05' AS DATE) AS TIMESTAMP)
SELECT CAST('2202020-10-05' AS DATE) > CAST('2020-10-05' AS TIMESTAMP) AS t
SELECT CAST('2020-10-05' AS TIMESTAMP) > CAST('2202020-10-05' AS DATE) AS f
SELECT CAST(CAST('2202020-10-05' AS DATE) AS TIMESTAMPTZ)
SELECT CAST('2202020-10-05' AS DATE) > CAST('2020-10-05' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) AS t
SELECT CAST('2020-10-05' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) > CAST('2202020-10-05' AS DATE) AS f
SELECT CAST(CAST('4714-11-24 BC' AS DATE) AS TIMESTAMPTZ)
SET TIME ZONE 'UTC-2'
SELECT CAST('4714-11-24 BC' AS DATE) < CAST('2020-10-05' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) AS t
SELECT CAST('2020-10-05' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) >= CAST('4714-11-24 BC' AS DATE) AS t
SELECT CAST('4714-11-24 BC' AS TIMESTAMP) < CAST('2020-10-05' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) AS t
SELECT CAST('2020-10-05' AS TIMESTAMPTZ) >= CAST('4714-11-24 BC' AS TIMESTAMP) AS t
RESET timezone

query: explain (costs off) select count(*) from date_tbl where f1 between '1997-01-01' and '1998-01-01'
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM date_tbl WHERE f1 BETWEEN '1997-01-01' AND '1998-01-01'

query: select count(*) from date_tbl where f1 between '1997-01-01' and '1998-01-01'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM date_tbl WHERE f1 BETWEEN '1997-01-01' AND '1998-01-01'

query: explain (costs off) select count(*) from date_tbl where f1 not between '1997-01-01' and '1998-01-01'
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM date_tbl WHERE f1 NOT BETWEEN '1997-01-01' AND '1998-01-01'

query: select count(*) from date_tbl where f1 not between '1997-01-01' and '1998-01-01'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM date_tbl WHERE f1 NOT BETWEEN '1997-01-01' AND '1998-01-01'

query: explain (costs off) select count(*) from date_tbl where f1 between symmetric '1997-01-01' and '1998-01-01'
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM date_tbl WHERE f1 BETWEEN SYMMETRIC '1997-01-01' AND '1998-01-01'

query: select count(*) from date_tbl where f1 between symmetric '1997-01-01' and '1998-01-01'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM date_tbl WHERE f1 BETWEEN SYMMETRIC '1997-01-01' AND '1998-01-01'

query: explain (costs off) select count(*) from date_tbl where f1 not between symmetric '1997-01-01' and '1998-01-01'
expected: EXPLAIN (COSTS false) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM date_tbl WHERE f1 NOT BETWEEN SYMMETRIC '1997-01-01' AND '1998-01-01'

query: select count(*) from date_tbl where f1 not between symmetric '1997-01-01' and '1998-01-01'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM date_tbl WHERE f1 NOT BETWEEN SYMMETRIC '1997-01-01' AND '1998-01-01'
SET datestyle = 'US,Postgres'

query: SELECT d1 AS us_postgres FROM TIMESTAMP_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS us_postgres FROM timestamp_tbl
SET datestyle = 'US,ISO'

query: SELECT d1 AS us_iso FROM TIMESTAMP_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS us_iso FROM timestamp_tbl
SET datestyle = 'US,SQL'

query: SELECT d1 AS us_sql FROM TIMESTAMP_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS us_sql FROM timestamp_tbl
SET datestyle = 'European,Postgres'
INSERT INTO timestamp_tbl VALUES ('13/06/1957')

query: SELECT count(*) as one FROM TIMESTAMP_TBL WHERE d1 = 'Jun 13 1957'
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) AS one FROM timestamp_tbl WHERE d1 = 'Jun 13 1957'

query: SELECT d1 AS european_postgres FROM TIMESTAMP_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS european_postgres FROM timestamp_tbl
SET datestyle = 'European,ISO'

query: SELECT d1 AS european_iso FROM TIMESTAMP_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS european_iso FROM timestamp_tbl
SET datestyle = 'European,SQL'

query: SELECT d1 AS european_sql FROM TIMESTAMP_TBL
expected: SELECT d1 AS european_sql FROM timestamp_tbl

query: SELECT to_timestamp('My birthday-> Year: 1976, Month: May, Day: 16', '"My birthday-> Year:" YYYY, "Month:" FMMonth, "Day:" DD')
SELECT to_timestamp('15 "text between quote marks" 98 54 45', E'HH24 "\\"text between quote marks\\"" YY MI SS')
expected: SELECT to_timestamp('15 "text between quote marks" 98 54 45', 'HH24 "\"text between quote marks\"" YY MI SS')

query: SELECT to_timestamp('1997 AD 11 16', 'YYYY BC MM DD')
SELECT to_timestamp('1997 BC 11 16', 'YYYY BC MM DD')
SELECT to_timestamp('1997 A.D. 11 16', 'YYYY B.C. MM DD')
SELECT to_timestamp('1997 B.C. 11 16', 'YYYY B.C. MM DD')

expected: SELECT to_timestamp('2011-12-18 11:38 +05', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH12:MI TZH')
SELECT to_timestamp('2011-12-18 11:38 -05', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH12:MI TZH')
SELECT to_timestamp('2011-12-18 11:38 20', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH12:MI TZM')

query: SELECT i, to_timestamp('2018-11-02 12:34:56', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF' || i) FROM generate_series(1, 6) i
expected: SELECT i, to_timestamp('2018-11-02 12:34:56', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF' || i) FROM generate_series(1, 6) AS i

SELECT to_date('-44-02-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT to_date('-44-02-01 BC', 'YYYY-MM-DD BC')

SHOW timezone
